title: Strengthening Nursing Practice Competencies: Comparative Analysis of Learning Motivation Factors in Blended Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can compare and explain at least three motivational factors of face-to-face, online, and blended learning modes.
Learners can propose educational design plans utilizing social interaction and flexibility elements in blended learning environments.
Learners can develop motivation-enhancing strategies applicable to actual elementary education settings through project-based assessments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
